Body:
sampling_rate = 1000
emg = nk.emg_simulate(duration=20, sampling_rate=sampling_rate)
emg_cleaned = nk.emg_clean(emg, sampling_rate=sampling_rate)
assert emg.size == emg_cleaned.size
original, _, _ = biosppy.tools.filter_signal(signal=emg, ftype='butter',
    band='highpass', order=4, frequency=100, sampling_rate=sampling_rate)
emg_cleaned_biosppy = nk.signal_detrend(original, order=0)
assert np.allclose((emg_cleaned - emg_cleaned_biosppy).mean(), 0, atol=1e-06)
